text: RT @NWFishEA: River Lune today then south to the Lostock tomorrow 🎣 @FishFarmEA @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/ZXQNo0n8Zg

You learn something new every day they say!

Well I never knew that sewage fungus could grow on a concrete step just below this sewage outfall pipe.  Pretty obvious where the pollution is coming from don't you think @EnvAgency? 🤔

Not helping the discharge area is it?  🤨 https://t.co/BJUp2UPvSL
#Powick #Worcestershire mobile pumps in full flow, and in the spotlight. @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/vhBCxEsePg

This is a sewage discharge area for a pipe that discharges directly onto the surface of the ground

Shouldn't have black suspended solids on the surface like this

Shouldn't be this wet either

Why is this allowed to go on @EnvAgency? 🤔 

Compliant with GBR?🤨

#Northumberland https://t.co/RFJtMApZa7
RT @EnvAgency: If your area is at risk of #flooding, remember that flood water can contain hidden dangers like lifted manhole covers and sh…

text: @BristolCouncil @EnvAgency Did you know Bristol Council has a history of allowing developments to be built in an area of flood risk in the last 25 years? The current incumbent @MarvinJRees wants to build even more, he failed to hit his home build figure in his manifesto .  Failed filed in F as in Fiction

@xrunnerwill @DCfieldteamsEA @johncurtinEA @jamiemcclaughl1 @EnvAgencySW @MariaHerlihyEA @MoretonBack1 Easter always seems to be the default Xmas for us doesnt it.  Cant remember the last year where we were not busy over Xmas 😀 Hope you get a break from your exceptionally busy week too Will and best wishes.  Catch up soon when we eventually can👍

text: @hadnock @VisitDeanWye @EnvAgency @EnvAgency reduction in staff and resources means there is much less monitoring than there used to be. When there are issues with pollution, including that from agricultural fields, the available legislation is now much less likely to be enforced. @EnvAgency needs more teeth!

text: @AmiesPhilip @VerValleySoc @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Oh, there's a water meadow on the side I'm standing that would have been perfect... They planted trees, put a path in & call it a park. It flooded too, but not deliberately, and not enough. good luck little trees 🙄
